short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 31, 2022 at 04:00 pm EDT.
description: NPP Agriculture and AgriFood Canada Lacombe Research and Development Centre has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a Pressure Vessel intended to thermally hydrolyze animal by products and food wastes into value added commodities as detailed herein and in accordance with the line items identified at Annex B, Basis of Payment. The Contractor must deliver the requirement with specifications as per Annex \
full_summary:
== Tender Notice ==
### Tender Information

* **Tender ID**: 01587-232306
* **Title**: Pressure Vessel
* **Official Language**: English
* **Reference Number**: WS3577190839-Doc3608342024
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3577190839
* **Publication Date**: 2022-09-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-25T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2022-11-25
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-12-15
* **Expected Contract End Date**: (Note: This date seems to be incorrect - expected end date precedes expected start date)
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled

### Contract Information

* **UNSPAC Code**: 41103400
* **Description**: Laboratory environmental conditioning equipment
* **Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* The tender is open to Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contract Details

* **Delivery Location**: Lacombe
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* **Contact Information**: Willy Zumbado Diaz, willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

* The tender description and supporting documentation are available on the Ariba Discovery website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14127257?extsite=MTQxMjcyNTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I made some slight changes to the formatting and text to make it more professional and clear. However, I did try to stay as faithful to the original as possible. 
Please let me know if you would like me to make any changes. 

Also, one point to note is that there is an error in the Expected Contract End Date field
